item.description:
Castor Oil Packs are a good natural remedy for a variety of ailments, from swollen feet to digestive problems! Join Susan Gale to learn how to create your own and how to make use of this amazing healing oil.

Bring your own cotton flannel and a towel, and you can create your own pack for immediate use!

Please join us for great food and conversation!

Also, many come to the potlucks other than Meetup members, so do not look at the RSVP's to determine if it will be a well attended event! We do hope you will come and join other like-minded folks!
item.name: The Worcester Indigo Children and Parents October Meetup
